page.title: 16Everyday Life in Wooler
page.content: Wake up at seven,jump out of bed, Give a punch to Ted. Pull on my clothes, On come my socks over my toes, Nobody knows I had too long a doze. Put out my breakfast,I get up last, Tea tastes too hot. "Morning Tot",I say to my brother. Run down to school,ding goes the bell. Lectures on stories,long division sums Time to go swimming. The bell goes ringing, Now for singing. Queue in the line,at dinner time. Now for Drama,partnered with Lara, Then it's R.E. and verbs in French. History now,Lara gets a row! Walk up the Peth,Mum lets me in, Go up to my room,get changed soon. Of out to play,then watch T.V. Come in for tea,homework I see, Then it's bed,watch out for Ted!
